Lurking in the Dark

Our story is a creative and unique idea. We explore Finleyâ€™s life and how he deals with his brother's mysterious death. Joe MacGreggor goes on a scout camping trip in a beautiful forest next to a pristine and tranquil lake. Little did he know about the Shadow Lord and his plan to create an army! Finley decides to look into the death of Joe almost five years after the horrid and unsolved murder. Finely visits the lake when camping with his friends, but little did they know who was lurking in the dark.
